offer_of_employment.preferred: Clear offer with start date and role

position_and_duties.preferred: Detailed list of responsibilities matching job title
position_and_duties.unacceptable: Undefined duties or 'other duties as assigned' without scope

term_of_employment.preferred: At-will (standard in US) or fixed term with renewal

termination_notice.unacceptable: Employee must give > 30 days notice while Employer gives none

non_compete.preferred: None or limited to direct competitors for 6 months
non_compete.acceptable: Direct competitors for 12 months, limited geography
non_compete.unacceptable: Broad non-compete > 12 months or unlimited geography

ip_assignment.preferred: Company owns IP created within scope of employment
ip_assignment.acceptable: Company owns IP related to company business
ip_assignment.unacceptable: Company owns all IP created by employee 24/7 (including hobby projects)
